title: Warwick Ult Bug
body:
I just played a game as Warwick and Surpressed an Akali and they walked out of it. I remained doing my strikes which was even weirder. 
There was no way for her to break it either. I didn't get CC'd nor did she have a way to break it herself. 

Has anyone else seen this?

replies.body: Well if you continued damaging her like you said, it would be a good thing.
Wouldn't that be a good thing?
How would that be a good thing the Akali walked out of my Ult
